project.name: |---- 005-starbuzz-v2
project.description:
This project introduces several new concepts related to structure layer: + links to webpages outside current site + title attribute added to a tag to improve accessibility (besides a tooltip is displayed) + id attribute on heading as a way to provide a landing spot for href. + opening a new window when the user clicks on a link, instead of reuse current window
index.html : The main page for Starbuzz coffee. It includes links to pages in this website as well as a link to an outside website.
